question:
The Ruwanwelisaya was the site of inauguration of the new Sri Lankan Presidentâ€™s term. With reference to this, consider the following statements:
  1. The Ruwanwelisaya is a Buddhist Stupa.
  2. It was constructed by a Chola King.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Ruwanwelisaya is a stupa in Sri Lanka. It has one of the largest collections of relics in the world. It is also one of the tallest stupas- standing at 103m high. It is also known as the Swarnamali Chaitya or Mahathupa. Statement 2 is incorrect: It was constructed by King Dutugemunu in 140 BC. It is an icon of Sinhalese Buddhism. It was constructed after his defeat of a Tamil Chola King. King Dutugemunu became the ruler of the entire island after this war.
